movie_title: Chocolate: Meet a real Willy Wonka ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: Mmm, delicious! Hear a real-life chocolate maker talking about her job! For audio and transcript dow

vocabulary.definition: the art of making or selling sweets and chocolates
vocabulary.example: The shop specialized in confectionery, offering a variety of handmade chocolates and candies.

vocabulary.definition: to create or design something new
vocabulary.example: The company's aim is to constantly invent innovative products that meet customers' needs.

vocabulary.definition: to introduce a new product to the market for the first time
vocabulary.example: The tech company plans to launch its latest smartphone next month.

vocabulary.definition: the desire of consumers to buy a product based on factors like price and availability
vocabulary.example: The success of the new product will depend on consumer demand in the current market.

vocabulary.definition: to become available for purchase in stores
vocabulary.example: The highly anticipated video game will hit the shelves next week.

vocabulary.definition: a complete failure or something that is unsuccessful
vocabulary.example: Despite the marketing efforts, the new product turned out to be a flop in the market.
